abstract: Grand jury clears former Louisville men's basketball player Chris Jones of rape and sodomy charges.
lead_paragraph: Two months after his arrest connected to allegations of sexual assault toward two women at a party, Jones and two other men were cleared of rape and sodomy charges.

headline.main: Former Louisville Player Chris Jones Is Cleared by Grand Jury
headline.print_headline: Former Louisville Player Is Cleared by Grand Jury

snippet: Two months after his arrest connected to allegations of sexual assault toward two women at a party, Jones and two other men were cleared of rape and sodomy charges.
